title: Annual Sports Day 2025 - A Grand Success
content: Our school's Annual Sports Day was celebrated with great enthusiasm and spirit. Students from all classes participated in various track and field events, showcasing their athletic abilities. The event was graced by Chief Guest Mr. Rajesh Kumar, District Sports Officer. Winners were awarded medals and certificates. The day concluded with a spectacular closing ceremony and prize distribution.

title: Admissions Open for Session 2025-26
content: We are pleased to announce that admissions are now open for the academic session 2025-26 for classes Nursery to XII. Limited seats available. Early bird discount of 10% on tuition fees for registrations before March 31st. Visit our admission office or apply online through our portal. Documents required: Birth Certificate, Previous School TC, Passport Photos, Aadhar Card.

title: Science Exhibition Winners Announced
content: Congratulations to all participants of the Inter-School Science Exhibition! Our students secured 1st position in Senior Category and 2nd position in Junior Category. Special appreciation to Priya Sharma (Class 10) for her innovative project on Solar Water Purification and Arjun Patel (Class 8) for his working model of Smart Traffic System.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Schedule
content: The PTM for all classes will be held on February 5th, 2025. Timing: Classes I-V: 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM, Classes VI-X: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM, Classes XI-XII: 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM. Parents are requested to carry the student diary and previous report cards. Individual appointments can be scheduled through the school app.

title: Winter Vacation Homework Guidelines
content: Dear Parents, Winter vacation homework has been uploaded on the school portal. Students are encouraged to complete project work creatively. Reading at least 2 books during vacation is recommended. Holiday homework submission deadline: First day after vacation. Wishing everyone a joyful and safe winter break!
